revised_title: Roman Antiquities and Monuments in Durham and York
tldr: In a letter to the Royal Society, Martin Lister describes a Roman altar found in Durham and other Roman artifacts in York. He provides detailed descriptions and illustrations of the altar, including its inscriptions and bas-relief carvings. Lister also discusses the historical context of the discoveries and their significance to the understanding of Roman life and culture in the region.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
